  • Method Details

    • slide

      public Slider slide(gameutils.func.prim.Floatc slide)
      Set the runnable that is called whenever this slider is interacted with. The float it is called with (0-1) represents the ratio value of the current slider.
      Parameters:
      slide - the runnable
      Returns:
      itself, for chaining

    • value

      public Slider value(gameutils.func.prim.Floatp value)
      Sets the runnable that return the value of the slider (0-1).
      Parameters:
      value - the value
      Returns:
      itself, for chaining
